responsibilities: Spearheaded Android app development at Penn State's A11y(Accessibility) Lab, prioritizing gesture detection & speech synthesis for disabled communication.

Developed and implemented an innovative app leveraging cutting-edge machine learning models for real-time gesture detection, significantly enhancing communication speed from 10 to 60 words per minute.
Conducted comprehensive data collection from 3 disabled volunteers, optimizing data quality via 15 recorded daily gestures per volunteer.

Mentored and guided over 320 students, with student evaluations indicating a 97% satisfaction rate and improvement in troubleshooting proficiency.
Assisted in grading over 1,000 assignments and exams, with my structured feedback approach adopted across the course for its effectiveness in student improvement.
Engineered Emotorad's e-commerce site, achieving a 25% increase in engagement through the strategic use of React, Redux, Django, and MongoDB.
Enhanced site performance, cutting load times and adeptly handling a 37% traffic increase, ensuring seamless scalability.
Spearheaded the creation of the MU20 Education Outreach app using React Native, revolutionizing high school learning experiences.
Orchestrated a collaborative team of 5 interns, driving agile development strategies to meet educational transformation objectives.
